Option.Name: HostPlatformOnly
Option.Description: A helper option to make an installed build for your host platform only, so that you don't have to disable each platform individually

Option.Name: HostPlatformEditorOnly
Option.Description: A helper option to make an installed build for your host platform only, so that you don't have to disable each platform individually

Option.Name: AllPlatforms
Option.Description: Include all target platforms by default

Option.Name: CompileDatasmithPlugins
Option.Description: If Datasmith plugins should be compiled on a separate node.

Option.Name: WithWin64
Option.Description: Include the Win64 target platform

Option.Name: WithWin32
Option.Description: Include the Win32 target platform

Option.Name: WithMac
Option.Description: Include the Mac target platform

Option.Name: WithAndroid
Option.Description: Include the Android target platform

Option.Name: WithIOS
Option.Description: Include the iOS target platform

Option.Name: WithTVOS
Option.Description: Include the tvOS target platform

Option.Name: WithLinux
Option.Description: Include the Linux target platform

Option.Name: WithLinuxAArch64
Option.Description: Include the Linux AArch64 target platform

Option.Name: WithLumin
Option.Description: Include the Lumin target platform on Windows

Option.Name: WithLuminMac
Option.Description: Include the Lumin target platform on Mac

Option.Name: WithHoloLens
Option.Description: Include the HoloLens target platform

Option.Name: WithClient
Option.Description: Include precompiled client targets

Option.Name: WithServer
Option.Description: Include precompiled server targets

Option.Name: WithDDC
Option.Description: Build a standalone derived-data cache for the engine content and templates

Option.Name: HostPlatformDDCOnly
Option.Description: Whether to include DDC for the host platform only

Option.Name: SignExecutables
Option.Description: Sign the executables produced where signing is available

Option.Name: AnalyticsTypeOverride
Option.Description: Identifier for analytic events to send

Option.Name: EmbedSrcSrvInfo
Option.Description: Whether to add Source indexing to Windows game apps so they can be added to a symbol server

Option.Name: GameConfigurations
Option.Description: Which game configurations to include for packaged applications

Option.Name: WithFullDebugInfo
Option.Description: Generate full debug info for binary editor and packaged application builds

Option.Name: VS2019
Option.Description: Use Visual Studio 2019 to build Windows targets. By default, Visual Studio 2017 is used for maximum compatibility

Option.Name: BuiltDirectory
Option.Description: Directory for outputting the built engine

Option.Name: CrashReporterAPIURL
Option.Description: The URL to use to talk to the CrashReporterClient API.

Option.Name: CrashReporterAPIKey
Option.Description: The API key to use to talk to the CrashReporterClient API.

Node.Name: Compile UE4Editor Win64
Node.Produces: #UE4Editor Win64;#UE4Editor Win64 Unstripped;#UE4Editor Win64 Stripped;#UE4Editor Win64 Unsigned;#UE4Editor Win64 Signed;#UE4Editor Win64 WithExceptions

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Compile UE4Editor Mac
Node.Produces: #UE4Editor Mac;#UE4Editor Mac Unstripped;#UE4Editor Mac Stripped;#UE4Editor Mac Unsigned;#UE4Editor Mac Signed;#UE4Editor Mac WithExceptions

Node.Name: Compile UE4Game Win64
Node.Produces: #UE4Game Win64;#UE4Game Win64 Unstripped;#UE4Game Win64 Stripped;#UE4Game Win64 Unsigned;#UE4Game Win64 Signed

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Compile UE4Game Win32
Node.Produces: #UE4Game Win32;#UE4Game Win32 Unstripped;#UE4Game Win32 Stripped;#UE4Game Win32 Unsigned;#UE4Game Win32 Signed

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Compile UE4Game Mac
Node.Produces: #UE4Game Mac;#UE4Game Mac Unstripped;#UE4Game Mac Stripped;#UE4Game Mac Unsigned;#UE4Game Mac Signed

Node.Name: Build Tools Win64
Node.Requires: Compile UnrealHeaderTool Win64;#NotForLicensee Build Tools Win64

Log.Message: Embedding source file information into PDB files...

Node.Name: Build DDC Win64
Node.Requires: #UE4Editor Win64;Build Tools Win64;#Build Tools CS Binaries

Node.Name: Build DDC Mac
Node.Requires: #UE4Editor Mac;Build Tools Mac;#Build Tools CS Binaries

Property.Name: DDCLinuxRequires
Property.Value: #UE4Editor Linux;Build Tools Linux;#Build Tools CS Binaries

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: Compile UnrealHeaderTool Win64;$(UE4Editor);#UE4Editor Win64 Unstripped;#UE4Editor Win64 Stripped;#UE4Editor Win64 Unsigned;#UE4Editor Win64 Signed;#Build Tools Win64;#Build Tools CS Binaries;#Rules Assemblies

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: $(InstalledRequirements);#UE4Game Win64;#UE4Game Win64 Unstripped;#UE4Game Win64 Stripped;#UE4Game Win64 Unsigned;#UE4Game Win64 Signed

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: $(InstalledRequirements);#UE4Game Win32;#UE4Game Win32 Unstripped;#UE4Game Win32 Stripped;#UE4Game Win32 Unsigned;#UE4Game Win32 Signed;#Build Tools Win32

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: $(InstalledRequirements);#UE4Game IOS;#UE4Game IOS Unstripped;#UE4Game IOS Stripped;#Compile UnrealHeaderTool Mac

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: $(InstalledRequirements);#UE4Game Linux;#UE4Game Linux Unstripped;#UE4Game Linux Stripped;#Build Tools Linux

Tag.Except: $(CopyInstalledExceptions);#Strip Tools for Installed Win64;#Sign Tools for Installed Win64

Property.Name: FilterRequirements
Property.Value: #Compile UnrealHeaderTool Mac;$(UE4Editor);#UE4Editor Mac Unstripped;#UE4Editor Mac Stripped;#UE4Editor Mac Unsigned;#UE4Editor Mac Signed;#Build Tools Mac;#Build Tools CS Binaries;#Rules Assemblies

Property.Name: FilterRequirements
Property.Value: $(FilterRequirements);#UE4Game Mac;#UE4Game Mac Unstripped;#UE4Game Mac Stripped;#UE4Game Mac Unsigned;#UE4Game Mac Signed

Property.Name: InstalledRequirements
Property.Value: #Compile UnrealHeaderTool Linux;#UE4Editor Linux;#UE4Editor Linux Unstripped;#UE4Editor Linux Stripped;#Build Tools Linux;#Build Tools CS Binaries;#Rules Assemblies
